events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your qualifications carefully.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your experience with software development and devops skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to assist you throughout the interview process and answer any questions you might have.
The initial screening interview has been conducted successfully. We were impressed with your technical background and problem-solving abilities.
Thank you for promptly responding to our invitation for the technical interview. Your enthusiasm for the Engineering role is very appreciated.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your software engineering projects.
You successfully completed the technical interview which covered several software development challenges and devops scenarios.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss cultural fit and company values with you.
The HR interview went well, and you demonstrated strong alignment with the companyâ€™s culture and teamwork principles.
We have formally proposed an offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the details and get back to us with your decision.
You have responded with positive feedback on the offer and expressed your enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! We are excited to have you onboard as a Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Welcome to the team! We will provide all resources needed for a smooth start.
The hiring process is now complete. We look forward to your contributions and success within the engineering department.
